modName: Allow Use of Mulltiple Master Files in the Creation Kit
descriptionHtml:
Why I created this mod:
Finding true information in this 'filter bubble', many false facts filled internet is difficult nowadays.

The creation kit wouldn't allow me to open multiple master files. Most of the information on the internet on how to fix this didn't provide me with the correct information on how to do it. I discovered that most people only talked about putting

bAllowMultipleMasterFiles=1
bAllowMultipleMasterLoads=1

into the general section of SkyrimEditor.ini.

This isn't enough to make the creation Kit work properly. There is more to add in the archive section of this ini file. So, after hours and hours of researching I finally found the answer on how to do it. I created this mod in hopes that my findings will help others be able to open multiple master files in the creation kit.

Installation Instructions:
Insert my ini file into the Skyrim Folder

OR

Insert in SkyrimEditor.ini what's mentioned in the txt file in my mod.

Requirements:
You need all of the DLCs to replace your SkyrimEditor.ini with mine. If you don't have all the DLCS, then get rid of the words for the DLCS that you don't have in the archive section of my SkyrimEditor.ini.


NOTE:
Do not download with NMM. This is my first mod so I'm not good at making mods yet. For some reason the check box to not let people download my mod with NMM was greyed out. So, I couldn't check it.
author: Me
